Understanding the VW Infinity Squeeze

 * Prior to 2008 (VW Infinity Squeeze) Porsche was a significant shareholder in
   VW.
 * October 2008 Porsche took its stake to 30%, then 50%. However, Porsche led
   most investors to believe they would not be attempting a takeover.
